Executive Assistant Job at HR-Aid Consults




        
    

        
        HR-Aid Consults  - Our client, a Fashion Brand located in Lekki, Lagos State, is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (On-Site)

About the Role
     

            
    




	We are seeking to hire an Executive Assistant to join the team. We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Executive Assistant to support the daily operations of the business.
	This role involves managing various administrative tasks, providing project tracking and documentation support, contributing to business development efforts, and assisting with proposal writing for client projects seeking funding.
	The ideal candidate will be detail-oriented, efficient, and able to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment.


Key Responsibilities


	Editing/Drafting Reports. Assist in the preparation, editing, and drafting of reports, presentations, and correspondence.
	Ensure content is clear, accurate, and delivered on time. Proofread for grammar, spelling, and formatting errors.
	General Research Conduct research on industry trends, competitive analysis, and other relevant topics.
	Provide summarized findings and recommendations to support strategic decision-making.
	Calendar Management & Scheduling Manage executive calendars, schedule appointments, meetings, and conference calls.
	Coordinate with internal and external stakeholders to ensure seamless scheduling and time management.
	Project Tracking & Documentation Track progress of ongoing projects, ensuring deadlines are met.
	Maintain and organize project documentation, including timelines, deliverables, and meeting notes.
	Data Entry Accurately input and maintain data in internal databases, spreadsheets, and systems. Ensure data integrity and assist with generating reports as needed.
	Assist with business development efforts, including lead generation, client outreach, and follow-up.
	Carry out other responsibilities as required,


Educational Qualifications and Experience


	Associate’s or Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Communications, or related field
	4+ years of experience in an executive support or administrative role preferred.
	Proven experience as an Executive Assistant or in other administrative roles
	Strong organizational and multitasking skills with the ability to prioritize tasks effectively
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
	Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and familiarity with project management tools
	Ability to conduct research and analyze information
	Attention to detail and ability to maintain confidentiality


Salary
N250,000 / Month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: talent@hr-aidconsults.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Hotel Manager",
  "description": "Residency Hotel Limited is one of the leading hospitality industries in Nigeria with over 10 branches across the nation and more than 30 years in the industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Hotel Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki Pahse 1, Lagos&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	The General Manager is responsible for driving operational excellence, boost revenue growth, and foster a culture of exceptional service delivery.
	This role demands strong leadership, a deep understanding of the hospitality sector, and a commitment to maintaining high standards of quality and customer satisfaction at the hotel.


Key Responsibilities
Operational Management:


	Revenue generation through strong customer relationship and aggressive marketing targeting key customers within the area.
	Oversee daily operations across hotel to ensure efficiency and effectiveness.
